arabicText: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِنَّاۤ أَعۡطَیۡنَـٰكَ ٱلۡكَوۡثَرَ

translations.en: BEHOLD, We have bestowed upon thee good in abundance:
translations.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِنَّاۤ أَعۡطَیۡنَـٰكَ ٱلۡكَوۡثَرَ

translations.en: hence, pray unto thy Sustainer [alone], and sacrifice [unto Him alone].
Verily, he that hates thee has indeed been cut off [from all that is good]!
